verses.1: A khangham bel keimah Johan in Teeltuam ahi, kong it taktak tonu le na pawlpi mite kiangah lai ka hong gelh hi. Kei bek in a hong it hi loin thuman a thei taktakte khempeuh in zong hong it uh hi.
verses.2: Thuman thei ihih manin a tawntungin tua thu ah i kip ding hi.
verses.3: Pa Pasian le a Tapa Jesu Khris in dikna, hehpihna le nopsakna, eite tungah hong pia henla, thuman le itna tawh tua thuphate khempeuh eite aʼ hong hi tahen.
verses.4: Pa Pasian in eite hong thupiakna bangmahin na pawlpi mite pawl khat in thu a mantakin a zuihna uh mu ka hih manin ka nuam mahmah hi.
verses.5: Tua ahih ciangin ka hong it tonu aw, ka hong thum nopna panin: Eite khempeuh khatlekhat ki-it ni, cihna ahi hi. Hih kong gen thu pen thu thak hi lo a, a kipat cil pek a kipanin i neihsa thupiakna ahi hi.
verses.6: Itna thu kong gen ciangin Pasianʼ thupiakte zui ding cihna ahi hi. A kipat cil a kipan na zak sa uh ahi hih thupiakna pen na khan tawntungun zui-in itna na nei ta un.
verses.7: Bang hang hiam cih leh leitungah midangte a khem tampi hong om ta a, tua mite in Jesu Khris, mihing banga hong paina thu a nial uh hi. Tua bang mite pen mi khemte hi a, Khrisʼ Gal ahi uh hi.
verses.8: Tua ahih ciangin na sep sa uh thuman taan kha loin, a kimtakin na ngah theih nadingun limtakin kidawm un.
verses.9: Khrisʼ thuhilhna zui loin a khengvalin a pai mite pen Pasian tawh a kipawl lo ahi hi. Ahi zongin a thuhilhna a zuite pen Pa Pasian le a Tapa tawh a kipawl ahi uh hi.
verses.10: Tua ahih manin Khrisʼ hilh ahi hih thute a hilh lo midang khatpeuh note kiangah a hong pai leh na inn uh ah zong na tungsak kei unla, zong na hopih kei un.
verses.11: Bang hang hiam cih leh tua bang mite ading thupha a deihsak mite pen amauʼ nasep hoih lohna ah zong a kipawl ahi uh hi.
verses.12: Gen ding tampi ka neih lai hangin lai-in hong gelh lo zaw-in, eiteʼ lungdamna a kicin zawk theih nadingin kei hong pai-in khatlekhat maitang kimu-in thu gen khawm dingin ka kingaihsun hi.
verses.13: Teeltuam ahi hih lai-a om pawlpi mite in hopihna kam hong khak uh hi.
